product_name: GSI Outdoors Ultralight Salt & Pepper Shaker
long_description: Bring out the flavor in your camp meal with the GSI Ultralight Salt & Pepper shaker. Twin-chamber shaker can be filled with salt and pepper; single-sided shaker cap twists into place to dispense your spices. Waterproof cap keeps spices dry and fresh. Clear copolyester resin body is lightweight and strong; shaker weighs only 1 oz. Convenient filler cap stows below the base and makes it easy to refill a compartment.
short_description: Bring out the flavor in your camp meal with the GSI Ultralight Salt & Pepper shaker.
